p: In Justice's Court before D Lauman Justice of the Peace
Charge of Buggery in favour crime with a drunk a Man

T. J. Andies Atty. Prosecuting a complaint filed February 18th 1888 Warrant issue came time to George Grant Pohecinan for service who returned the same this February 18th 1888 Push with the Deft under such complaint read P.P. Pearson to defense of having in the matter and that there was cause therfore the defendant quilty as charged it is have and by the court that the defendant be held the Mnext term of the U.S. Dist Court and his bail is hereby fixed at $50 and that in of such bail that he be committed to teh county jail where he shall be discharged by the
P.P Pearson required to recognize in the same order for his defendant in the case retained for the following
